meanings.definition: Bursting open at maturity to release seeds.
meanings.sent1: The dehiscent pod split open to scatter its seeds.
meanings.sent2: The dehiscent fruit burst open to disperse its seeds.
meanings.sent3: The dehiscent seed pod decided it was time to share its seeds with the world.
meanings.sent4: The dehiscent capsule revealed its treasure of seeds to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The dehiscent seed pod exploded with life as it scattered its seeds far and wide.

meanings.definition: Splitting open along a seam to release contents.
meanings.sent1: The flower dehiscented, revealing its hidden pollen.
meanings.sent2: The ripe fruit dehiscented, spilling its juicy insides.
meanings.sent3: The overstuffed suitcase dehiscented its contents all over the airport floor.
meanings.sent4: The volcano dehiscented, unleashing a fiery stream of lava.
meanings.sent5: The balloon dehiscented with a loud pop, showering confetti everywhere.
